column4: hi all, i'm running 12.04 and would like to know if it is possible to add a program to the unity bar on the left side, the program has to be started from the shell (it's name is 'ding', a dictionary) so when i start it it appears in the bar but after closing it i cant's start it again...
probably with gnome-extensions (ppa), but it was very broken when i tried to use any gnome-extension
i don't even have gnome-extension, apt-cache search can't find it
